name: Magnety
description:
Descritpion

Magnety is puzzel/platformer coop game where a magnet was split in two. Each halve contain a special property: red can push blue with force and blue can pull red. Combine them to overcome adversities and reach the goal to complete the level.

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 by a single person.

If you want to see more about my work check out:

My Itch.io - https://ribjare.itch.io/

Controls: Player 1 - Blue
  • Move - W A S D
  • Jump - Space
  • Magnetic Pull (Pulls Red) - F
  • Rotate Camera - Q
Player 2 - Red
  • Move - Navigation Arrows
  • Jump - Rigth Shift
  • Magnetic Push (Pushes Blue) - E (Single Player mode) or L (Two Player Mode)
  • Rotate Camera - Rigth Control
